title: Charming 1 BR w/ DR/Office, walk to Union Sq & the Financial District
posting_body: This is a beautifully remodeled, classic San Francisco one-bedroom apartment with a formal dinning room that can be a wonderful office.
The living room is separated from the dinning room by an arch way.
The period detailing is lovely.
This is a rent controlled building.
There are only 7 apartment in the building.
The apartment is on the third floor of a well-maintained vintage building.
All floors are newly refinished hardwood with the exception of the bathroom which is tile.
The kitchen has been remodeled with granite counter tops, a full size gas stove and a dishwasher.
There is a laundry room on the first floor.
A roof top has a furnished pergola with city views.
The building is located near many transit lines, tech shuttles, restaurants, stores, medical offices, and other businesses.
Pets are welcome.
12 month lease.
Water and garbage are included.
This is a rent controlled building.
Open house Sunday 12PM to 2:30PM
